Floral basket and congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Il from diplomatic corps
    Pyongyang, April 23 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 71st anniversary of the heroic Korean People's Army.
 They were handed to DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today by Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK Shaher Mohammed Abdlah who is doyen of the corps.
